Translation.String: سوف المواطنين عدم الذهاب إلى المدرسة أو العمل خلال عطلة نهاية الأسبوع، وسوف تكون أكثر نشاطا خلال النهار
노동자들이 점심 식사를 위해 외출 할 수 있도록 허용
일부 시민들은 점심 시간에 퇴근하고 돌아 오기 전에 근처의 가게로 이동합니다.
允许车位较大的搜索半径。会导致汽车通过建筑物旅行越高半径。
改善商业，工业和办公需求
要求が一緒にリンクされ、人口住宅のオフに基づいています。
需要は空の職場の番号にリンクになります。
需要は空の職場の番号にリンクになります。
Деактивировать большую часть мод для удаления на более поздний срок.
Позволяет использовать либо 12-часовой или 24-часовой шкале на дату / время бар.
Change how the date is formatted on the date/time bar. CHANGED
Set the language the mod is displayed in. CHANGED
Don't travel to school if under this many hours left CHANGED
Don't travel to work if under this many hours left CHANGED
Allows events to happen at certain unique buildings in your city. CHANGED
Allows you to change the speed of the day and night cycle. CHANGED
The time progression multiplier to apply to the day and night cycle. CHANGED
EXPERIMENTAL: No cooldown timer on random events CHANGED
Don't allow events to empty fully before creating a new one. CHANGED
EXPERIMENTAL: Allow commercial fix for inactive buildings CHANGED
Enables a fix to stop commercial buildings becoming inactive. Disable only if there are massive problems with it on in your city. CHANGED
DEVELOPER: Print all unique buildings in your city to the console CHANGED
Prints the names of all unique buildings currently placed in your city to the console. Use only if creating your own custom events. CHANGED
DEVELOPER: Enable "Force" XML parameter to immediately create a chosen event CHANGED
Allows the "Force" parameter to force an event to happen immediately upon applying these settings. CHANGED
